'''Monetoo Will Guide You Home (II)''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Natlan: The Land of Fire and Competition (II)]]''. The achievements are earned by following [[Monetoo]] in [[Tezcatepetonco Range]], [[Quahuacan Cliff]], and [[Ochkanatlan]].
